title: IVR-Based Constructive-Generative Learning Course for Industrial Systems Mental Model Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational engineering and industrial systems
context.additional_context: In environments with limited access to actual industrial facilities, cultivating system comprehension and design capabilities through immersive virtual reality (IVR).

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate industrial cooling systems in an IVR environment and explain causal relationships between components.
Learners can design and construct industrial systems using SDVR tools and logically articulate their operational principles.
Learners can propose solutions for real-world industrial system problems based on virtual reality-based mental models.

resources: Supplementary Learning Materials (System Diagrams, Task Guidelines)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
